synopsis.text: Kaoruko Moeta, a 15-year-old high school student and budding manga artist known by her pen name, Chaos, finds herself at a crossroads when her work ranks last in a reader poll. To help her improve, her editor suggests she move into a dormitory exclusively for female manga creators. Here, she meets a diverse group of manga artists: Koyume Koizuka, a shoujo manga specialist, Ruki Irokawa, a teen romance manga illustrator, and Tsubasa Katsuki, a shounen manga artist. Together, they strive to hone their skills and achieve their dreams of becoming successful manga creators, supporting each other through the trials and tribulations of their shared journey. This heartwarming tale showcases the daily lives of these aspiring artists as they work tirelessly to bring their creations to life.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
